name: ShadowRunner (ShadowRainOwO)
description:
Description

Shadow Runner is a running game. The protagonist in the game is deeply trapped in a dream, and the way to escape from the dream is to reach the finish line through parkour. During this period, the protagonist will encounter many difficulties, and the player needs to overcome these difficulties to reach the final destination.

Info

Lab 1

Author: Yuxuan Wang 

Game design document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1j7urpNb1Ngjkgyz5pI35_6RYaIPvBc2M/edit?usp=sh...

Control

WASD to move

Swing the mouse to control camera

Q to exit the game

R to revival on the bed

Holding Shift to sprint
